open.author.name: Marek Marecki
message:
Allow dynamic timeouts

Viua should allow specifying dynamic timeouts.
Currently only static timeouts are possible to specify.

Allowing dynamic timeouts means that receive and join instructions
would have to support fetching timeouts from registers.

Question: should a special Timeout type be introduced, or
may timeouts be specified by plain integers?
What about arbitrarily-sized integers?
